example.text: Less than 25% of Americans believe #Mifepristone should be taken off the market. Yet, MAGA Republicans are still trying to outlaw this medication nationwide as they seek to criminalize abortion care in every state. [[user]] will not stand for it. [[url]]

I want to thank [[user]] and [[user]] for partnering with me to introduce this bipartisan, bicameral legislation to boost community redevelopment, expand economic prosperity, and strengthen communities across the country.

Today, [[user]] proposed carbon pollution standards for power plants that will avoid over 600 million metric tons of CO2 pollution. That’s equivalent to reducing the annual emissions of half the cars in the US! Thankful to [[user]] and EPA for helping keep our communities healthy. [[url]]

As they seek to criminalize women’s healthcare in every state across the country, MAGA Republicans are inflicting physical, psychological, and economic torture on families all over. We will never stop fighting back against these draconian abortion bans. [[url]]

When airlines mess up, passengers shouldn’t be on the hook for food, hotels, and other costs that may arise. Happy to see [[user]] and [[user]] taking steps to protect American consumers and require airlines to provide compensation when major delays or cancellations occur. [[url]]

I was grateful to sit down with the Honourable Ahmed Hussen, Canada’s Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion, to discuss how the United States and Canada can collaborate in our shared goal of lowering housing costs and addressing systemic inequities in housing. [[url]]

When airlines mess up, passengers shouldn’t be on the hook for food, hotels, and other costs that may arise. Happy to see [[user]] and [[user]] taking steps to protect American consumers and require airlines to provide compensation when major delays or cancellations occur. [[url]]
